text: Hello, my name is Gabi. My friend Torsten and I are currently furnishing our new apartment and looking for affordable furniture.
Hi, I'm Gabi (30). My friend Torsten and I are in the process of setting up our first apartment together.
Hey, we're Gabi and Torsten, both 30, and we're in the middle of making our new apartment cozy on a small budget.
Hi there! Gabi here (30, art historian) with my boyfriend Torsten. We're currently roaming around Germany in a Sprinter van to snag some cool second-hand furniture for our place.
I am very interested in your listing and would like to know if it is still available.
I saw your ad and would be very happy to receive more information.
The piece looks really great, and we would be very interested in buying it if it's still available.
As an art historian, I instantly fell in love with this piece â€“ I hope it's still up for grabs!
Could you please tell me a bit about the condition? Are there any defects or signs of use?
I'm curious about the current condition â€“ are there any scratches, stains, or other signs of wear and tear?
Was the item used in a smoke-free, pet-free home? And are there any scratches or other signs of wear?
How's the condition? Any scratches or dings we should know about?
Would the price be negotiable?
Would you perhaps have any flexibility on the price? Our budget is unfortunately a bit limited.
We have to watch our budget a little â€“ is there any wiggle room on the price?
Any chance you'd be willing to come down a bit on the price? Our budget is pretty tight.
As a young couple on a tight budget, we'd be really grateful if you could knock the price down a little.
We could pick up the item at your convenience. When would be a good time for you?
We have a van and can be flexible with the pickup time. For example, we could come by this Saturday if that suits you.
We've got a Sprinter van and are pretty flexible â€“ when would be best for you for pickup?
Our borrowed Sprinter is ready to roll. Just let us know when works for you, and we'll swing by!
Thank you for your time. Kind regards, Gabi
I look forward to hearing from you. Thank you and best regards, Gabi
Thank you so much, and best regards, Gabi
Thanks for reading! We look forward to your reply. Cheers, Gabi & Torsten
Would shipping perhaps be an option? We would of course cover the costs.
If you have any further questions for us, please feel free to let us know.
If delivery is possible, we would be very happy. Otherwise, we can also pick it up ourselves.
If you could even deliver it, that would be awesome (we'd of course cover any costs)!
If you happen to have other furniture you're looking to get rid of, we'd probably be interested as well ðŸ˜‰.
